name: damp

effect.x-y: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text.x-y: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
